html.p: The Data Preview feature has been improved to include support for data sources that contain information about the data structure within the actual file. Splunk now provides an interface to view and interact with fields that may be found in a file header or within the body of the data source.

ul.li: Ingest structured inputs: CSV, JSON and W3C/IIS
Preview extracted fields and header settings
Preview and iterate on configurations for headers during data input
Adjust field headers and field that are ingested
